about.name: Apon D'Cruze
about.description:
While my academic focus is rooted in technology, I have a profound passion for reading and writing fiction. I have participated in various writing competitions, including one organized by Bangladesh Art Nation.

I also love to do portrait and landscape photography. I want to become a professional photographer if fate is with me.

In addition to my literary pursuits, I am enthusiastic about broadcasting and aspire to become a professional photographer. As a computer science background student, I want to do some work on cyber security.

education.degree: Bachelor of Computer Science and Engineering

experience.title: Customer Service Officer
experience.description: Handled customer inquiries, resolved issues, and ensured excellent service to enhance user experience.
